docTitle.titlePart:
Dynamics of one-site fermionic model in the
presence of precessing magnetic field

byline.docAuthor: A.C. Aguiar Pinto, R. Bruno, M.T. Thomaz*

byline.affiliation: Instituto de Fisica, Unioersidade Federal Fluminense, R. Gal. Milton Tavares de Souza s/nÂ°.,

front.div:
Abstract
The one site self-interacting fermionic model is considered in the presence of an external
magnetic field precessing with constant angular velocity around a fixed axis. We get the exact
density operator for the identical particle system as well as its one-particle properties, for general
initial conditions. Due to the non-trivial topology of the external magnetic field, the one-particle
states get Berry's phases. We show that the geometric phases contribute to the frequency of the
one-particle population state in the adiabatic regime.
PACS: 03.65.-w; 05.30.-d
